img_summary: The image depicts a delicate branch adorned with white, cotton-like buds, likely representing a medicinal or alchemical ingredient within the context of the game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding and following text, it appears to be part of a catalog of ingredients used for crafting or healing, each tied to specific locations in the game world. This particular ingredient is visually distinct and may symbolize purity or rarity, aligning with the game's thematic focus on exploration and resource collection.
